	

crbug.com/476370: Test cells get appropriate width when total width of cells is less than 1%.

FAIL:
Expected 667 for width, but got 666. 

<td id="blue" data-expected-width="667"><div></div></td>
FAIL:
Expected 333 for width, but got 334. 

<td id="green" data-expected-width="333"><div></div></td>
